meanings.definition: An advantage or profit gained from something.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables has many benefits for your health.
meanings.sent2: She realized the benefits of studying hard when she got good grades.
meanings.sent3: The benefits of exercise include feeling stronger and happier.
meanings.sent4: The benefits of teamwork are like pieces of a puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of reading every day can expand your knowledge and imagination.

meanings.definition: Financial assistance or payment provided by an employer.
meanings.sent1: His job offers great benefits like health insurance and retirement plans.
meanings.sent2: She was happy to receive her benefits package from the new job.
meanings.sent3: The benefits from work helped cover her medical expenses.
meanings.sent4: The benefits of the job were like a safety net during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of employment include more than just a paycheck.

meanings.definition: To receive an advantage or profit from something.
meanings.sent1: She benefits from regular exercise by feeling more energetic.
meanings.sent2: He hopes to benefit from the new training program at work.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to benefit from having a new scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The community will benefit from the new park being built.
meanings.sent5: The students will benefit greatly from the upcoming field trip.
